feed.title: moving the default display to mbtc

entry.title: moving the default display to mbtc
entry.summary: In an email dated November 14, 2013 at 10:00 PM, Alan Reiner mentioned that the smallest unit which can be easily transferred is 54.3 uBTC and standard fees are 500 uBTC, which may cause some awkwardness but not a deal breaker. Meanwhile, the fed rate was reduced to 0.0001/kb.
